definitions.text: of or relating to an economy, the system of production and management of material wealth
examples: aspects of social, political, and economical life

definitions.text: of or relating to the science of economics
using the minimum of time or resources necessary for effectiveness
examples: an economic use of home heating oil
an economical use of her time

definitions.text: concerned with worldly necessities of life (especially money)
examples: he wrote the book primarily for economic reasons
gave up the large house for economic reasons
in economic terms they are very privileged
it was no longer economic to keep the factory open
have to keep prices high enough to make it economic to continue the service
